## My favourite equation.

If 
$$
a = b,
$$

then

$$
a^2 = ab
$$

As such:

$$
(a - b)(a + b) = b(a - b)
$$

---

Now we cancel $(a - b)$ to get:

$$
a + b = b
$$

Hence:

$$
b + b = b
$$

Therefore:

$$
2b = b
$$

Thus:

$$
2 = 1
$$
